info.title: SuperU API
info.description: Comprehensive API reference for SuperU voice agents, calls, tools, contacts, audiences, and knowledge bases.

tags.name: Agents
tags.description: Create, list, import, update, and delete agents.

tags.name: Phone Numbers
tags.description: Fetch phone numbers available in your account.

tags.name: Audiences
tags.description: Create and manage audiences and contacts.

post.description: Creates a Twilio call request for an assistant.

requestBody.description: Request body for Create Twilio call.

x-codeSamples.label: cURL
Python

post.description: Analyzes a completed call and optionally extracts custom fields.

requestBody.description: Request body for Analyze Twilio call.

example.summary: Caller asked about pricing and requested a callback.

x-codeSamples.label: cURL
Python

post.description: Creates an outbound campaign call for a configured assistant.

requestBody.description: Request body for Create outbound call.

x-codeSamples.label: cURL
x-codeSamples.source:
curl --request POST \\
  --url https://voip-middlware.superu.ai/campaign/outbound/create_call/superu \\
  --header 'superU-Api-Key: YOUR_SUPERU_API_KEY' \\
  --data '{
  "assistant_id": "ag_01HXR8FM5QYCVXAK4TYFJ4AEP0",
  "to": "+14155552671",
  "from": "+14155550000",
  "campaign_id": "demo_call",
  "customer_name": "Ava",
  "customer_id": "cust_123",
  "variable_values": {
    "key": "value"
  }
}'

x-codeSamples.label: Python
x-codeSamples.source:
from superu import SuperU

client = SuperU("YOUR_SUPERU_API_KEY")

payload = {
    "assistant_id": "ag_01HXR8FM5QYCVXAK4TYFJ4AEP0",
    "to": "+14155552671",
    "from": "+14155550000",
    "campaign_id": "demo_call",
    "customer_name": "Ava",
    "customer_id": "cust_123",
    "variable_values": {
        "key": "value"
    }
}

response = client.calls.create_outbound_call(**payload)
print(response)

post.description: Creates a new SuperU voice agent.

example.name: Demo Assistant
example.first_message: Hi, thanks for taking the call.

requestBody.description: Request body for Create agent.

x-codeSamples.label: cURL
x-codeSamples.source:
curl --request POST \\
  --url https://voip-middlware.superu.ai/agent/create \\
  --header 'superU-Api-Key: YOUR_SUPERU_API_KEY' \\
  --data '{
  "type": "outbound",
  "name": "Demo Assistant",
  "company_name": "SuperU",
  "assistant_name": "Ava",
  "first_message": "Hi, thanks for taking the call.",
  "voice": "90ipbRoKi4CpHXvKVtl0",
  "voice_id": "90ipbRoKi4CpHXvKVtl0",
  "voice_provider": "11labs",
  "speed": "1.0",
  "bg_noice": "false",
  "backgroundNoise": false,
  "script": "You are a friendly assistant.",
  "industry": "Blank Template",
  "useCase": "Blank Template",
  "form_model": {
    "key": "value"
  },
  "assistant_data": {
    "key": "value"
  },
  "knowledgeBase": [
    "kb_abc123"
  ],
  "tools": [
    "tool_01HXR9259WDZ2X3ZZKQ7HDG4C2"
  ],
  "call_forwarding": {
    "key": "value"
  }
}'

x-codeSamples.label: Python
x-codeSamples.source:
from superu import SuperU

client = SuperU("YOUR_SUPERU_API_KEY")

payload = {
    "type": "outbound",
    "name": "Demo Assistant",
    "company_name": "SuperU",
    "assistant_name": "Ava",
    "first_message": "Hi, thanks for taking the call.",
    "voice": "90ipbRoKi4CpHXvKVtl0",
    "voice_id": "90ipbRoKi4CpHXvKVtl0",
    "voice_provider": "11labs",
    "speed": "1.0",
    "bg_noice": "false",
    "backgroundNoise": False,
    "script": "You are a friendly assistant.",
    "industry": "Blank Template",
    "useCase": "Blank Template",
    "form_model": {
        "key": "value"
    },
    "assistant_data": {
        "key": "value"
    },
    "knowledgeBase": [
        "kb_abc123"
    ],
    "tools": [
        "tool_01HXR9259WDZ2X3ZZKQ7HDG4C2"
    ],
    "call_forwarding": {
        "key": "value"
    }
}

response = client.agents.create_agent(**payload)
print(response)

post.description: Lists agents with pagination and optional filters.

requestBody.description: Request body for List agents.

x-codeSamples.label: cURL
Python
x-codeSamples.source:
from superu import SuperU

client = SuperU("YOUR_SUPERU_API_KEY")

payload = {
    "page": "1",
    "limit": "20",
    "inbound_or_outbound": "outbound",
    "search_query": "sales"
}

response = client.agents.list(**payload)
print(response)

post.description: Updates the display name of an existing agent.

requestBody.description: Request body for Update agent name.

x-codeSamples.label: cURL
x-codeSamples.source:
curl --request POST \\
  --url https://voip-middlware.superu.ai/agent/update/name \\
  --header 'superU-Api-Key: YOUR_SUPERU_API_KEY' \\
  --data '{
  "agent_id": "ag_01HXR8FM5QYCVXAK4TYFJ4AEP0",
  "name": "Sales Assistant V2"
}'

x-codeSamples.label: Python
x-codeSamples.source:

client = SuperU("YOUR_SUPERU_API_KEY")

payload = {
    "agent_id": "ag_01HXR8FM5QYCVXAK4TYFJ4AEP0",
    "name": "Sales Assistant V2"
}

response = client.agents.update_name(**payload)
print(response)

x-codeSamples.source:
from superu import SuperU

response = client.phone_numbers.get_owned()

post.description: Returns call logs for one assistant or for all assistants.

x-codeSamples.label: cURL
x-codeSamples.source:
curl --request POST \\
  --url https://voip-middlware.superu.ai/call-logs/all?limit=20&page=1&before=2026-02-01T00%3A00%3A00Z&after=2026-01-01T00%3A00%3A00Z&status=completed&campaign_id=demo_call&search_query=Ava \\
  --header 'superU-Api-Key: YOUR_SUPERU_API_KEY'

x-codeSamples.label: Python
x-codeSamples.source:
from superu import SuperU

client = SuperU("YOUR_SUPERU_API_KEY")

payload = {
    "assistant_id": "all",
    "limit": "20",
    "page": "1",
    "before": "2026-02-01T00:00:00Z",
    "after": "2026-01-01T00:00:00Z",
    "status": "completed",
    "campaign_id": "demo_call",
    "search_query": "Ava"
}

response = client.call_logs.get_logs(**payload)
print(response)

patch.description: Updates fields on an existing tool.

example.name: check-user-status-v2
example.description: Check if a user exists in CRM

requestBody.description: Request body for Update tool.

x-codeSamples.label: cURL
x-codeSamples.source:
curl --request PATCH \\
  --url https://voip-middlware.superu.ai/tool/tool_01HXR9259WDZ2X3ZZKQ7HDG4C2 \\
  --header 'superU-Api-Key: YOUR_SUPERU_API_KEY' \\
  --data '{
  "name": "check-user-status-v2",
  "description": "Check if a user exists in CRM",
  "parameters": {
    "key": "value"
  },
  "tool_url": "/api/check-user",
  "tool_url_domain": "https://your-api.com",
  "type": "http",
  "async_": false
}'

x-codeSamples.label: Python
x-codeSamples.source:
from superu import SuperU

client = SuperU("YOUR_SUPERU_API_KEY")

payload = {
    "tool_id": "tool_01HXR9259WDZ2X3ZZKQ7HDG4C2",
    "name": "check-user-status-v2",
    "description": "Check if a user exists in CRM",
    "parameters": {
        "key": "value"
    },
    "tool_url": "/api/check-user",
    "tool_url_domain": "https://your-api.com",
    "type": "http",
    "async_": False
}

response = client.tools.update(**payload)
print(response)

x-codeSamples.label: cURL
x-codeSamples.source:
curl --request DELETE \\
  --url https://voip-middlware.superu.ai/tool/tool_01HXR9259WDZ2X3ZZKQ7HDG4C2 \\
  --header 'superU-Api-Key: YOUR_SUPERU_API_KEY'

x-codeSamples.label: Python
x-codeSamples.source:

client = SuperU("YOUR_SUPERU_API_KEY")

payload = {
    "tool_id": "tool_01HXR9259WDZ2X3ZZKQ7HDG4C2"
}

response = client.tools.delete(**payload)
print(response)

post.description: Creates a contact after validating fields.

requestBody.description: Request body for Create contact.

x-codeSamples.label: cURL
x-codeSamples.source:
curl --request POST \\
  --url https://voip-middlware.superu.ai/contact/create \\
  --header 'superU-Api-Key: YOUR_SUPERU_API_KEY' \\
  --data '{
  "first_name": "Ava",
  "last_name": "Patel",
  "email": "ava.patel@example.com",
  "country_code": "+1",
  "phone_number": "5551234567",
  "audience_id": "aud_01HXR9V5S7W1S0Q4H4PDTGM43B"
}'

x-codeSamples.label: Python
x-codeSamples.source:

client = SuperU("YOUR_SUPERU_API_KEY")

    "country_code": "+1",
    "phone_number": "5551234567",
    "audience_id": "aud_01HXR9V5S7W1S0Q4H4PDTGM43B"
}

response = client.contacts.create(**payload)
print(response)

post.description: Creates a knowledge base and uploads CSV/PDF files.

requestBody.description: Request body for Create knowledge base.

x-codeSamples.label: cURL
x-codeSamples.source:
curl --request POST \\
  --url https://voip-middlware.superu.ai/knowledge-base/create \\
  --header 'superU-Api-Key: YOUR_SUPERU_API_KEY' \\
  --form 'name=FAQ' \\
  --form 'description=Frequently asked questions' \\
  --form 'files=@/path/to/file.pdf'

x-codeSamples.label: Python
x-codeSamples.source:
from superu import SuperU

client = SuperU("YOUR_SUPERU_API_KEY")
with open("sample.pdf", "rb") as f:
    response = client.knowledge_base.create(
        name="FAQ",
        description="Frequently asked questions",
        files=[f]
    )
print(response)

}
